titleStmt.title: A quære concerning drinking Bath-water, at Bathe, resolved by Evgenivs Philander.
titleStmt.author: Guidott, Thomas, fl. 1698.
Jorden, Edward, 1569-1632. Discourse of naturall baths and minerall waters.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Guidott, writing under the pseudonym Evgenius Philander. Cf. BM
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
